Package ibo1.Protocol

Class ROSSystem

java.lang.Object
ibo1.Protocol.ROSSystem
public class ROSSystem extends Object
ROSSystem - Class that represents ROSSystem communications

It defines the commands and errors and communication with the ROS system for the setting of system states in the system state machine. Direct representation would be the SystemStateMachine.cpp in the ROS system.

Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim

    • setSystemNoRoboter

      private void setSystemNoRoboter(IRCClient ircClient) throws IOException, ProtocolException
      Sets the ROS system into no roboter arm state
      Parameters:
      ircClient - ircClient to be used
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by sending and receiving the buffer
      ProtocolException - thrown if returned cmd does not match expected or if chess engine doesn't exist.

    • getSystemStateChoices

      public List<String> getSystemStateChoices()
      Returns:

    • setSystemState

      public boolean setSystemState(IRCClient ircClient, String systemState) throws ProtocolException, IOException
      Method that communicates with the ROS system to set the system state to the supplied one. If the system state choice doesn't exist this function returns false. Please use getSystemStateChoices for possible system states.
      Parameters:
      ircClient - the IRCCLient
      systemState - the system state to set the ROS system into
      Returns:
      true if the system got set into the supplied system state
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - thrown by sending and receiving the buffer
      IOException - thrown if returned cmd does not match expected
